Scope_key2:
`Variables` ko logon ki tarah imagine kijiye - log jinke dimaag me kuch memory hai - aur wo iss memory mein kuch values store karte hain.
Ek program ko ek country ki tarah imagine kijiye jahan ye `variables` rehte hain.
Scope_key3: Iss program ki duniya mein `variables` bahut strangely behave karte hain. Kuch `variables` (global `variables`) ki memory program ke har hisse mein kaam karti hai aur usme stored values ko hum kahin bhi access kar sakte hain. Leki kuch `variables` (local `variables`) program ke ek hisse se bahar nikalte hi apni yaddast (memory) kho dete hain aur usme stored values ko hum use nahi kar sakte.
Scope_key5:
*iAmGlobal* ek Global `Variable` hai aur use kahin bhi use kar sakte hain.
*iAmLocal* ko aap bas function() ke andar hi use kar sakte hai. Uske bahar wo undefined hai.
Scope_key6: Global aur local variables ke baare mein aur janne ke liye aap
Scope_key10: Apne pichle programs mein jo aapne `variables` use kiye hain, unki scope identify kijiye.
Scope_key11: Niche diye hue program ko run kijiye aur usme `error` identify kijiye
Scope_key12: Upar likhe hue program ka correct form kya hoga?
